features.title: Audit Logging
features.description: Track admin actions with filtering by action type and date range

features.title: License Assignment
features.description: Assign licenses to users with inventory tracking

schemaChanges: Added AuditLog model with action, targetType, targetId, details, ipAddress, userAgent

auditLogging: license.reclaim - logged with licenses and userEmail
license.assign - logged with license and userEmail

lessonsLearned: Audit logging should never break main operations (catch errors silently)
createAuditLog helper function enables consistent logging across endpoints
License inventory calculates availability from totalLicenses - assignedCount
Duplicate license assignment prevented at endpoint level
